items.label: Location
items.description: Specify the Azure Location where the machine should be deployed.

items.label: Naming Prefix
items.description: Specify whether to inherit the naming prefix from the business group, or create a custom one. This prefix will be used in the names of the deployed virtual machine and any related resource groups, NICs, storage containers and availability sets.

items.label: Custom Naming Prefix
items.description: Specify a custom naming prefix. This prefix should begin with a letter, and can only contain letters, numbers and dashes. Non-ASCII and special characters are not permitted.

items.label: Virtual Machine Image Type
items.description: Specify the virtual machine image type. This can be a stock image from the Azure Marketplace, or you may specify a custom one stored in your subscription. Note that if a custom image is used, it must be deployed to the same storage account where the source image resides.

items.label: Virtual Machine Image
items.description:
Specify the identifier for the machine image. If using a stock image from the Azure Marketplace, the image URN should be in the following format: [publisher:offer:sku:version]. This URN can be found using Azure CLI command: [azure vm image list].
If using a custom image, for Storage Account the image URL can be found in the properties of the source VHD blob.
 For Managed Disk the format should be ResourceGroupName:CustomImageName.

items.label: Virtual Machine Image OS Type
items.description: Specify the OS type of the virtual machine image. Valid values are Linux and Windows.

items.label: Admin User
items.description: Enter a user name that will be used to create a local admin account on the Azure Machine. This account will be used to log on to and manage the machine. Note that [root], [admin] and [administrator] are not permissible values.

items.label: Authentication Type
items.description: Select whether to use password or SSH based authentication to securely connect to the Azure machine. SSH authentication based on public-private key exchange is applicable for Linux based Azure machines.

items.label: Password
items.description: Specify a password for administrator user. This password must be between 12-72 characters long and contain at least one lower case character, one upper case character, one number, and one special character.

items.label: Confirm Password
items.description: Confirm the administrator password.

items.label: SSH key
items.description: Specify the contents of an SSH public key file (such as id_rsa.pub). This file can be generated with tools like ssh-keygen or openssl.

items.label: Series
items.description: Location field should be populated prior to picking the instance size series. Select the series that corresponds to the desired performance characteristics. For a complete guide to series specifications see the Azure documentation.

items.label: Size
items.description: Instance size series field should be populated prior to picking instance size. Select the instance size that corresponds to the desired VM configuration. For a complete guide to size specifications see the Azure documentation.

items.label: Details
items.description: Instance series and size field should be populated prior for displaying the instance details.  For a complete guide to instance specifications see the Azure documentation.

items.label: Resource Group
items.description: Specify whether to create a new or reuse an existing resource group. This resource group will contain the deployed virtual machine and other related objects.

items.label: Resource Group Name
items.description: Specify the name of the existing resource group.

items.label: Availability Set
items.description: Specify whether an Azure availability set should be used. If required, select whether to create a new or reuse an existing one.

items.label: Availability Set Name
items.description: Specify the name of the existing availability set.

items.label: Storage Type
items.description: Storage Type

items.label: VM Disk Type
items.description: Specify the Disk Type (HDD/SSD) for the Managed Disk.

items.label: OS Disk Storage Account
items.description: Specify the name of the storage account where the OS disk should be provisioned. If a name is not specified, a storage account will be selected from the reservation.

items.label: Enable Boot Diagnostics
items.description: Capture serial console output and screenshots of the virtual machine runnning on a host to help diagnose startup issues.

items.label: Diagnostics Storage Account
items.description: Specify the storage account where the diagnostic output should be stored.

items.label: Number of Data Disks
items.description: Specify the number of data disks to be created. The selected VM instance size must support this number of disks.

items.label: Disk 1 Name
items.description: Specify an optional name for this disk. If specified, the name should start with a number or a letter, must be up to 80 characters, should not contain special characters and should not end with hyphen or full stop.

items.label: Disk 1 Size (GB)
items.description: Specify a size for this disk in GB.

items.label: Host Caching  Disk 1
items.description: Select a host caching type for this disk.

items.label: Disk Configuration Disk 1
items.description: Select whether disk configuration should be explicitly specified or if the configuration should be inherited from an Azure storage account. If the configuration is inherited, vRealize Automation will store the disk in the best storage account from the available options.

items.label: Disk 1 Type
items.description: Specify the media type for this disk.

items.label: Replication Disk 1
items.description: Select a replication type for this disk.

items.label: Replication Disk 1 SSD
items.description: First disk replication type

items.label: Storage Account Name Disk 1
items.description: Specify an optional name for the storage account where the data disk should be provisioned. If a name is not specified, an appropriate storage account will be selected from the reservation.

items.label: Disk 2 Name
items.description: Specify an optional name for this disk. If specified, the name should start with a number or a letter, must be up to 80 characters, should not contain special characters and should not end with hyphen or full stop.

items.label: Disk 2 Size (GB)
items.description: Specify a size for this disk in GB.

items.label: Host Caching Disk 2
items.description: Select a host caching type for this disk.

items.label: Disk Configuration Disk 2
items.description: Select whether disk configuration should be explicitly specified or if the configuration should be inherited from an Azure storage account. If the configuration is inherited, vRealize Automation will store the disk in the best storage account from the available options.

items.label: Disk 2 Type
items.description: Specify the media type for this disk.

items.label: Replication Disk 2
items.description: Select a replication type for this disk.

items.label: Replication Disk 2 SSD
items.description: First disk replication type

items.label: Storage Account Name Disk 2
items.description: Specify an optional name for the storage account where the data disk should be provisioned. If a name is not specified, an appropriate storage account will be selected from the reservation.

items.label: Disk 3 Name
items.description: Specify an optional name for this disk. If specified, the name should start with a number or a letter, must be up to 80 characters, should not contain special characters and should not end with hyphen or full stop.

items.label: Disk 3 Size (GB)
items.description: Specify a size for this disk in GB.

items.label: Host Caching Disk 3
items.description: Select a host caching type for this disk.

items.label: Disk Configuration Disk 3
items.description: Select whether disk configuration should be explicitly specified or if the configuration should be inherited from an Azure storage account. If the configuration is inherited, vRealize Automation will store the disk in the best storage account from the available options.

items.label: Disk 3 Type
items.description: Specify the media type for this disk.

items.label: Replication Disk 3
items.description: Select a replication type for this disk.

items.label: Replication Disk 3 SSD
items.description: First disk replication type

items.label: Storage Account Name Disk 3
items.description: Specify an optional name for the storage account where the data disk should be provisioned. If a name is not specified, an appropriate storage account will be selected from the reservation.

items.label: Disk 4 Name
items.description: Specify an optional name for this disk. If specified, the name should start with a number or a letter, must be up to 80 characters, should not contain special characters and should not end with hyphen or full stop.

items.label: Disk 4 Size (GB)
items.description: Specify a size for this disk in GB.

items.label: Host Caching Disk 4
items.description: Select a host caching type for this disk.

items.label: Disk Configuration Disk 4
items.description: Select whether disk configuration should be explicitly specified or if the configuration should be inherited from an Azure storage account. If the configuration is inherited, vRealize Automation will store the disk in the best storage account from the available options.

items.label: Disk 4 Type
items.description: Specify the media type for this disk.

items.label: Replication Disk 4
items.description: Select a replication type for this disk.

items.label: Replication Disk 4 SSD
items.description: First disk replication type

items.label: Storage Account Name Disk 4
items.description: Specify an optional name for the storage account where the data disk should be provisioned. If a name is not specified, an appropriate storage account will be selected from the reservation.

items.label: Load Balancer Name
items.description: Specify the name of an optional pre-existing load balancer.

items.label: Backend Address Pool Name
items.description: Specify the name of an optional pre-existing backend address pool. This option is only available if a load balancer is specified.

items.label: Number of Network Interfaces
items.description: Specify the number of network interfaces to be created. The selected VM instance size must support this number of network interfaces.

items.label: NIC 1 Name Prefix
items.description: Specify an optional name prefix for this NIC.

items.label: IP Address Type NIC 1
items.description: Select the IP addressing mechanism for this NIC.

items.label: Networking Configuration NIC 1
items.description: Select whether the networking configuration should be explicitly specified or inherited from a vRealize Automation network profile.

items.label: vNet Name NIC 1
items.description: Optionally, specify the name of the pre-existing Azure vNet where the NIC will be connected.

items.label: Subnet Name NIC 1
items.description: Optionally, specify the name of the pre-existing Azure subnet where the NIC will be connected. If specified, this Azure subnet must be one associated with the specified Azure vNet.

items.label: Network Profile Name NIC 1
items.description: Optionally, specify the name of the vRealize Automation network profile to retrieve the Azure networking configuration from.

items.label: Public IP Address Name NIC 1
items.description: Optionally, specify the name of the Azure public IP address that will be associated with this NIC.

items.label: Enable Security Group Configuration NIC 1
items.description: Select whether to enable security group configuration for this NIC.

items.label: Security Group Name NIC 1
items.description: Specify the name of the security group to associate with this NIC. If no value is specified here, no security group will be applied.

items.label: NIC 2 Name Prefix
items.description: Specify an optional name prefix for this NIC.

items.label: IP Address Type NIC 2
items.description: Select the IP addressing mechanism for this NIC.

items.label: Networking Configuration NIC 2
items.description: Select whether the networking configuration should be explicitly specified or inherited from a vRealize Automation network profile.

items.label: vNet Name NIC 2
items.description: Optionally, specify the name of the pre-existing Azure vNet where the NIC will be connected.

items.label: Subnet Name NIC 2
items.description: Optionally, specify the name of the pre-existing Azure subnet where the NIC will be connected. If specified, this Azure subnet must be one associated with the specified Azure vNet.

items.label: Network Profile Name NIC 2
items.description: Optionally, specify the name of the vRealize Automation network profile to retrieve the Azure networking configuration from.

items.label: Public IP Address Name NIC 2
items.description: Optionally, specify the name of the Azure public IP address that will be associated with this NIC.

items.label: Enable Security Group Configuration  NIC 2
items.description: Select whether to enable security group configuration for this NIC.

items.label: Security Group Name NIC 2
items.description: Specify the name of the security group to associate with this NIC. If no value is specified here, no security group will be applied.
